title: The Bread That Smiles Back
location: Market Ward -> Petra's Golden Crust Bakery
description: Three customers at Petra's bakery have been found weeping uncontrollably after eating her honey loaves. Petra begs someone to investigate before word spreads.

turns.narrative: You arrive at Petra's flour-dusted shop. A man named Donal still weeps softly, hours after eating. The bread looks golden and normal, but Donal has not stopped crying since the first bite.
turns.consequence_a: A profound bittersweet sadness washes over you, fading after thirty minutes.
turns.choice_b: Examine the loaf without eating it
turns.consequence_b: You notice faint blue-grey striations through the crumb interior that shouldn't exist in normal bread.

turns.narrative: The effect traces back to 'Blue Fen Honey' Petra purchased from a new supplier named Lucius — a merchant who appeared at the gate last week selling honey at half price.
turns.consequence_a: Lucius admits the honey was harvested near a Void-seep in the Southern Fen — he didn't know it was dangerous.
turns.choice_b: Examine the honey jar for his stamp before confronting him
turns.consequence_b: You find a fox stamp in the wax seal. Armed with proof, Lucius pays damages voluntarily.

turns.narrative: With Lucius identified and tainted honey removed, you help Petra document Lucius's supply route for the Ward Warden.
turns.choice_a: File a formal report with the Ward Warden
turns.consequence_a: Lucius is fined and the Fen marked as a contaminated zone.
turns.choice_b: Let Lucius go with a stern warning
turns.consequence_b: Lucius leaves the city and switches to legitimate dry goods.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.
